message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this item, and I think you'd get a lot of use out of it. I'm willing to part with it for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $170?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me there?
